description.value: You instinctively sense when the people around you are feeling strong emotions or inner conflict. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Sense Motive]. If you aren't actively using Sense Motive on a creature who's enchanted, possessed, or subject to an emotion effect, the GM rolls a secret check, without the usual circumstance bonus and with a â€“2 circumstance penalty, for you to potentially notice the enchantment, possession, or emotion effect anyway.
